name: The Path Home
description:
Draw paths for ships while trying to avoid collisions. Draw a path into the corresponding colored portal.

A small game I made for the Heartland Gaming Expo. Created in two weeks, as a project to learn Unity with. No plans to do anything further with it. I am happy with it, and it is feature complete.

If you would like source code/art just message me and I'll try and find them.
